name: Pix liquida
Relationship: Compare its constituents: KREOSOTE.; PETROL.; PINUS; EUPION; TEREBINTH.; CARBOLIC ACID.

Chest: Rales through the lungs, and mucopurulent sputum; offensive odor and taste
Pain at a spot about the third left costal cartilage where it joins the rib
Skin: Cracked; itches intolerably; bleeds on scratching

details: Tar and its constituents act on various mucous membranes. Its skin symptoms are most important. A great cough medicine. Bronchial irritation after influenza. (KREOSOTE.; KALI-BICH.) Scaly eruptions. Much itching. CONSTANT VOMITING OF BLACKISH FLUID, WITH PAIN IN STOMACH. Alopecia. (FLUOR-AC.)
